message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it's worth a great deal, and I'm initially offering it to you for $14,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of the product. However, I am only able to offer $12,000 for the product. Thank you for considering my proposal.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  I could come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
